reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress has a classic style and appreciate its high-quality construction, with one noting it's perfect for work. The dress features a nice thick sweater knit fabric, sits well on the body, and has a flattering shape. They like its color, with one customer specifically mentioning the true navy shade, and find it comfortable to wear. Several customers note that the dress runs big in size. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress, fabric and fit - between sizes order down
items.body: What a cute dress! Bought for dinner on an upcoming cruise, and I’m confident the material will travel well. The dress will be easy to dress up or down in the future. The navy is a gorgeous, dark, true navy. The size Small fit was perfect for me, with the length I wanted, falling just above knees. According to the chart I was between sizes, but since I’m actively losing weight, I chanced the smaller of the two, and was glad I did. Fit insights for my great Small fit suggest women 5’5” or taller might find the dress too short: Height 5’1” Waist 28.5” Chest 38” Hips 38” Weight 133 Hope this information helps potential petite customers. Order and enjoy! Read more
items.author: Pugmama

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely dress!
items.body: Beautiful dress for a cute preppy look. I were it to church with a tan blazer and sandals. Many compliments. Fabric is thick enough that isn't see-through but not hot and heavy. I like that it's not too short either. I'm 5'3" 136lbs for reference, with wide hips Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice quality dress. Slightly large in bust area.
items.body: Really pretty, casual yet professional dress. It fits really well except in the bust area. I usually wear a size 2 dress, bra size A/B, 5'3", 105-110lb. The sides gape way out because I don't have much up top to fill that area. I may try to get it altered because I really do like it, but not sure if its worth the investment. If you're smaller on top, you may have the same issue. Size small seems like it would fit most people size 2-6, but best for someone with a cup size at least C to fill out the top properly (not having gaping at arms). Hope that helps. Read more
items.author: Pamela R.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress, Needed a smaller size
items.body: Really loved the dressed, however I am 5'2/ 116 pounds and the small was a little roomy for my taste. I had to return it but the ivory dress was lovely. I wish it came in an XS, because the quality of this dress was great just didn't have a size that worked for me. Read more
items.author: TaylorS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect love it
items.body: Really cute dress. Very comfortable. It's a thick material but, not too thick. A perfect A line dress. Read more
items.author: Ashley Noonan

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful green color
items.body: Beautiful dress only problem is the dress is so long had to get it hemmed . That’s why I gave it 3 stars . But fit like a glove . Read more
items.author: BKLYN ROE

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEAUTIFUL dress! Must buy!
items.body: I LOVE THIS DRESS! It is so classy and beautiful! The material doesn't wrinkle at all and is a bit heavier, like a sweater material. The quality is great, and it isn't too heavy or hot. The fabric is soft and well-made. I wore it the day my husband and I went to the courthouse for our marriage certificate. It was perfect! Read more
items.author: Alyssa

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Too long and stained
items.body: Too long for me. Plus, there was a stain on it. Read more
items.author: JJ79R

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Navy, Pink, Tealgreen, Ivory, Watermelon, Lightblue, Black, Cashmere, Oatmeal, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
